content: To build mental clarity and social confidence, one can join a free weekly program offered by Newel of Knowledge.
Supporting content creators through paid memberships or donations can help them avoid mid-roll ads and sponsorships, allowing them to continue producing content.
To become socially confident, one can join a waitlist for a specific program offered by Newel of Knowledge.

The video will cover why the brain creates stories, the problems with telling oneself stories, common scripts people follow, how to drop these scripts through self-anthropology, and how to live a narrative-free life.
